action.action-desc: Mr. Panetta (for himself and Mr. Kelly of Pennsylvania) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limitation on the estate tax valuation of certain real property used in farming or other trades or businesses.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Preserving Family Farms Act of 2023.

section.header: Increase in limitation on the estate tax valuation of certain real property used in farming or other trades or businesses

subsection.text: Section 2032A(a)(2) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking $750,000 and inserting $13,000,000.
Section 2032A(a)(3) of such Code is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking $750,000 both places it appears and inserting $13,000,000,
by striking 1998 in the matter preceding subparagraph (A) and inserting 2023, and
by striking 1997 in subparagraph (B) and inserting 2022.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply to the estates of decedents dying after the date of the enactment of this Act.
